content.text: Match ends, Espanyol 2, Atlético de Madrid 2.
Second Half ends, Espanyol 2, Atlético de Madrid 2.
Attempt saved. Pablo Daniel Osvaldo (Espanyol) right footed shot from very close range is saved in the centre of the goal.
Reyes (Atlético de Madrid) is shown the yellow card.
Álvaro Vázquez (Espanyol) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Juanfran (Atlético de Madrid).
Attempt missed. Sergio Agüero (Atlético de Madrid) left footed shot from the left side of the box is too high. Assisted by Raul García.
Corner,  Atlético de Madrid. Conceded by Jordi Amat.
Attempt missed. Raul García (Atlético de Madrid) header from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Tomas Ujfalusi with a cross.
Attempt missed. Raul García (Atlético de Madrid) left footed shot from the left side of the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Sergio Agüero.
Corner,  Atlético de Madrid. Conceded by Raúl Rodríguez.
Rui Fonte (Espanyol) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Reyes (Atlético de Madrid).
Rui Fonte (Espanyol) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Diego Godín (Atlético de Madrid).
Offside, Atlético de Madrid. Reyes tries a through ball, but Sergio Agüero is caught offside.
Substitution, Espanyol. Rui Fonte replaces Iván Alonso.
Attempt missed. Álvaro Vázquez (Espanyol) left footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Javi Chica.
Substitution, Atlético de Madrid. Juanfran replaces Diego Costa.
Attempt missed. Raul García (Atlético de Madrid) right footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Diego Costa.
Raul García (Atlético de Madrid) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.

Javi Márquez (Espanyol) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

Dangerous play by Raul García (Atlético de Madrid).
Iván Alonso (Espanyol) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Pablo Daniel Osvaldo (Espanyol).
Diego Godín (Atlético de Madrid) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Joan Verdú (Espanyol) left footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Javi Chica following a set piece situation.
Tiago (Atlético de Madrid) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.

Foul by Javi Chica (Espanyol).
Reyes (Atlético de Madrid) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

Attempt blocked. Tiago (Atlético de Madrid) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Diego Costa.
Substitution, Espanyol. Javi Márquez replaces Luis García.
Diego Costa (Atlético de Madrid) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

Goal!  Espanyol 2, Atlético de Madrid 2. Pablo Daniel Osvaldo (Espanyol) header from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Joan Verdú with a through ball.
